Work

Here's a selection of my recent work, which is a mixture of both client work and personal projects. If you would like to discuss working together, feel free to get in touch.

JavaScript Plugins

  • Notify.js - A handy wrapper for the Web Notifications API.
  • Shake.js - A custom 'shake' event plugin for mobile web browsers using device accelerometer.
  • Tap.js - A custom 'tap' event JavaScript plugin for mobile and tablet browsers.

Writing

  • HTML5 Doctor - Taking Web Audio Offline in iOS 6 Safari
